products.title: Spectrum, Fuscous Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum in fuscous grey is a blind designed to create an industrial or utilitarian feel in any modern home. A sturdy aluminium material, the glossy finish, and the cool, bold grey, combine to create a statement blind that is sure to catch the eye. Surround the fuscous grey with blacks, silvers, and whites for a modern monochrome colour scheme, scattering with the occasional bright yellow or bold orange.

products.title: Spectrum, Gull Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum's gull grey is a mid-grey, satin-finish blind, comprised of high quality aluminium slats that can be adjusted to allow the light in with ease, making it both functional and stylish to suit your every need. Using the gull grey in the home office will help you to create a pale, monochrome colour scheme, by omitting traditional black and going for greys and whites instead. If it's colour that you love, add in a sunny yellow or a sky blue as a brighter accent.

products.title: Ecowood, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in castle grey satin offers a subtle grey shade with a silky satin finish. Made from high quality faux wood, designed to withstand moist conditions, this blind has the full package: style, durability, and functionality. Take advantage of the range's suitability to any environment and use it as part of a monochrome bathroom scheme. Go for black and white tiling, a white suite, and black and grey accessories.

products.title: Ecowood, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in chic grey satin is as bold as grey gets, and this dark hue offers an air of moody sophistication. With a polished feel, the slats offer clean lines and ease of use. They can be adjusted quickly and simply to allow in more or less light as needed. Let the chic grey satin take centre stage against a white wall, and accent with a pale lemon yellow, making for the ideal colour scheme for a contemporary kitchen.

products.title: Impressions Mid Grey Faux Wood
products.description: The impressions faux wood blind is simple in style and will easily accessorise with any scheme. The sleek slats are made from upvc making them durable and practical for decorating window spaces in any room. The mid grey colourway gives a subtle touch of contemporary colour warmer than white, but just as smart and versatile. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, not only does this faux wooden blinds come with a fabulous five year guarantee, but customer-first service and industry-leading delivery times.

Presented in a neutral pebble tone, this sleek and timeless design that can be easily adjusted to control the natural light in any room. The upvc material is long lasting and convenient to clean, an easy option for busy lifestyles. products.title: Spectrum, Foggy Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The subtle soft cream-grey of the spectrum foggy grey is sweet and discreet, and everything in between. Colour-matched pull-cords and top and bottom rails help to create a streamlined look, so that you can enjoy this pretty hue without interruption. Group with charcoal greys and off-whites to create a softly monochrome colour scheme in an office or bedroom. Or create a sense of calm in the hallway or landing to welcome you and the family home after a stressful day out and about.

products.title: Spectrum, Moon Mist - Venetian Blind
products.description: The spectrum moon mist is the very definition of subtlety, with its pretty, creamy hue, accentuated by the matte satin finish. Slim aluminium slats can be gently raised, lowered, or tilted at ease, adding functionality to this already stylish blind. Craft a serene and soothing atmosphere in the nursery by placing the moon mist amongst soft off-whites and pale greens, with pretty checked patterns to match.

products.title: Spectrum, Grey Flannel - Venetian Blind
products.description: The satin-finish grey of the spectrum grey flannel is about as industrial a hue as there is. The grey colour provides contemporary style and the aluminium slats give the blind a functional and lasting quality. If you prefer a neutral look in the bedroom, and like to fill it dove greys, whites, and taupes, then the grey flannel could be the blind for you. Or team it with lime greens and blacks for a truly modern atmosphere in your dining room or office.

products.title: Ecowood, Porcelain Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in porcelain grey satin is a pretty yet unassuming piece in a pale dove grey and with a smooth, silky finish. This attractive blind is practical and durable, as well as offering style and sophistication to any room in the home. As for the colour? It matches everything. Give your lounge a contemporary makeover by opting for an ultra-trendy yellow and grey colour scheme. Paint one wall in a sunny yellow tone and the others in a soft white.

products.title: Wow Factor, Brushed Platinum - Venetian Blind
products.description: Metallic and eye-catching, the wow factor in brushed platinum combines functional utilitarianism with a subtle, luxury sheen, on a blind whose aluminium slats are easily adjusted to allow for changes in light and privacy needs. Complement a blue colour scheme in the home office or guest bedroom, accenting with matching ornaments, or simply use to add a metallic neutral to a bold, bright dining room, den, or living room, where cosy greens or deep plum purples might take centre stage.

products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: A pretty, shimmering blind, patterned with a soft glitter, the wow factor in silver star is soft and unobtrusive. The heavy-duty aluminium slats can be adjusted to allow just the right amount of light into the room, all controlled by easy-to-use pull-cords. Pretty pink bedrooms with a light and romantic feel will benefit from the silver star, which will glisten beautifully amongst white walls and hushed rose hues.

products.title: Ecowood, Antique Silver Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The beautifully grey-toned antique silver satin, from the faux wood ecowood range, has a distinctly vintage feel to it. Smooth, with light grain detailing, it offers sleek durability as well as tons of character and aesthetic appeal. Treat your master bedroom to a pretty vintage scheme, settling the antique silver satin against dusky pink walls and furnishing the room with subtle off-whites and dove greys.

products.title: Granite Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The matt grey finish on the granite aluminium blind makes this an excellent choice for any window in your home. Tilt, raise and lower this blind to take full control over the light entering your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Grey Perfora Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The grey perfora aluminium blind is unique with it's small light filtering holes, this will let more light in than other blinds, even when closed, but they help this blind to act more like a screen - gently filtering the light. Best used where privacy is not the most important feature of the blind, but being able to allow the light in is most important. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Vista, Squirrel Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista squirrel grey brings a light, industrial tone to any room, and with this blind, you can experience light and air whether it's opened or closed. Sturdy aluminium slats are home to perforated holes that let the light flow through whether opened or closed. For a cool, utilitarian look in the kitchen, team the squirrel grey with white tiles and silver accent colours. Or use in the home office for a fresh and airy feel that will soon have you knuckling down to some work.

products.title: Vista, Brushed Silver - Venetian Blind
products.description: The vista venetian blind in brushed silver combines sturdy pragmatism with a muted, industrial silver, with perforated holes allowing light to gently filter through. The blind is made from heavy gauge aluminium, making it durable and hardwearing. Team the brushed silver with dark burgundy for a moody, contemporary feel in a modern living room, or use in the hallway or landing to add depth and texture to a fairly neutral area.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Every bit as luxurious as the range implies, the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey satin has a sleek, satiny finish, joined by the palest cool grey colouring. Matching fittings, including designer-look ladder ribbons made from high quality linen, enhance this fashionable look, offering a clean and simple aesthetic that you'll love. For a stylishly chic look, pair the blizzard grey satin with a navy blue feature wall and cool white furniture.

products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments. Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole. Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness.
